BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The BBC's rolling news service with bulletins on the hour.

RelatedMaterial.PromotionalText:
Recommended Website: Pay a visit BBCi's News homepage and
launch the audio/video console. You'll be offered the latest
footage on the day's top stories available to view on demand.

BasicDescription.Title: World Business Report
BasicDescription.Synopsis: From London and New York, World Business Report brings not just the headlines, but the explanation behind the headlines and an examination of the trends in technology and the world of business.

RelatedMaterial.PromotionalText:
Recommended Website: Have your say on the latest events at
home and abroad. Find your way to BBCi's News forum and look
for Talking Point. Get online and make sure your voice is heard.

Web Link: You can get all the latest news delivered directly to
your desktop when you visit BBCi's News site. When you get
online, just look for 'Daily E-mail' and submit your details.
